item.title: Paramount Skydance Reportedly Forms Consortium With Middle East Sovereign Wealth Funds For $71 Billion Warner Bros Discovery Bid
item.description: According to a report by Variety, Paramount Skydance has formed a consortium with PIF, QIA, and ADIA to support its bid.

item.title: Medtronic Eyes M&A Deals To Augment Portfolio After Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates
item.description: Martha said in a post-earnings call with analysts that the company is not afraid to make investments to get companies that are close to market or just...

item.title: Why Did SDOT Stock Plunge To A Record Low Today?
item.description: Sadot said it expects a significant year-on-year fall in third-quarter revenue, attributing the decline to insufficient working capital.

item.title: Meta Wins Antitrust Case As Judge Upholds Instagram And WhatsApp Acquisitions
item.description: Meta was sued by the FTC in 2020 for antitrust concerns related to its acquisitions of Instagram and WhatsApp.

item.title: Meta’s Longtime Revenue Chief John Hegeman Departs Amid AI Leadership Reshuffle: Report
item.description: The move comes amid Meta’s push to justify its aggressive spending on artificial intelligence and streamline its executive structure.
